title: Did Hillary Clinton Side With Kremlin on Sanctions Due to a $500,000 Payment to Bill?
subtitle: A Fox News story cites only a sentence from a staffer's leaked email as proof of Clinton's wrongdoing.
author: Bethania Palma
vclaim: That Hillary Clinton opposed sanctions against Russia because of speaking fees her husband received from a Russian bank, and that the Clinton campaign used undue influence to kill a Bloomberg story about the incident.
